colophon.para: This manual was discovered as a scanned PDF file on the Internet in 2017. The scan was produced by Marcus Bennett in 2008. OCR was then applied to the pages and it was reformatted into Docbook 5.0.
To explain the DATA section in the service request descriptions in chapters 11 and 12, an appendix D was added describing the direct page (page 0) variables.
